definition: Aohan banner or Aokhan khoshuu in Chifeng 赤峰[Chi4 feng1], Inner Mongolia
to ramble/to rove/old variant of 熬[ao2]
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
Aohan banner or Aokhan khoshuu in Chifeng 赤峰[Chi4 feng1], Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: The aim was to provide the theoretical basis for genetic breeding of Aohan merino sheep.
sentences.chinese: 爲敖漢細毛羊的遺傳選育提供理論依據。
